descriptionStrings: I was born and live in Faridabad, India.
I love to learn and create new things.
I love to play video games.
I love to play basketball and badminton.
I love listening to the songs of XXXTENTACION, Anuv Jain and Arjit Singh.
I love to travel to new places.

projects.title: Groot Music
projects.description: I am a full time developer for this, This is basically a discord music bot with web dashboard using technologies such as Next.js, NextAuth.js, Node.js, Typescript, Redis and Express.

projects.title: UTDocs
projects.description: Simple minimalistic Documentation Generator. Made with Golang, TailwindCSS, Alpine.js

projects.title: Button Tickets
projects.description: A simple discord ticketing bot with buttons as interface

projects.title: SendClean
projects.description: A strongly typed api wrapper for https://sendclean.com with support for both node and browser. Uses in-built https module.

projects.title: Disable Safari Popup Blocker
projects.description: A simple shell script to disable popup blocker in Safari

projects.title: Mosix
projects.description: A music player application built with Quasar, Python and JioSaavn api

projects.title: Boilers
projects.description: An open-source project which helps beginners start with new frameworks easily.

projects.title: Discord Webhooks Node
projects.description: Easily send messages via discord webhooks using this package.
